1/3 Henry Ford said, ‘If I asked my customers what they want, they simply would have said a faster horse.’
2/3 Design is bedevilled by people who allow market research to make their decisions for them.
3/3 I always tell clients, if you really want to be out of the ordinary, be brave. Trust your instinct – it’s usually right.
